participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, Sofia has a passion for languages and music. She enjoys learning new cultures and is always keen to engage in conversations about her studies.
participant_1.background: one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. my next language to study is french. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i'm a musician.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and determined, Liam is dedicated to pursuing his dreams in music despite facing challenges. He balances his passion with work responsibilities and seeks encouragement from those around him.
participant_2.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

content.text: I'm good. Just got back from the gym.
